gondola.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a long narrow boat with a flat bottom and high points at each end, used on the canals in Venice in Italy
gondola.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the place where passengers sit that hangs beneath an airship or balloon1(2)
gondola.translation[0].definitions[2].de: the enclosed part of a cable car where the passengers sit
gondola.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a large set of shelves in a supermarket which displays goods on both sides
